website_summaries.verdict: Offers a strong level of protection for the animal, while allowing just enough freedom of movement.
pros: Works with multiple brands of harnesses for dogs
Uses an adjustable length of anchor between 17.5 and 26 inches
Gives the dog the freedom to lie down or look out the window while remaining safely constrained
cons: If a dog steps on the latch, it could pop the strap loose from the belt

customer_reviews.title: My son bought a small for his Jack Russell, and I got a medium for my Shih Tzu.  Pay attention because size matters here.
customer_reviews.text: This fits my Shih Tzu like it was made for him. He loves to travel with me in the car, but he also has a bad habit of hopping between the front and back seats, which isn't safe and is probably illegal. So I bought this harness, along with a tether that attaches and clicks into the seat belt holder, because he means everything to me, and his safety was paramount. this is going to be perfect for our outings. He might not like it at first, because he's used to getting his way. But he'll adjust, and I'll stop worrying. Thank you EzyDog for the great design and functionality. You've definitely solved my problem.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Safe driving with smaller dogs
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad that I can keep my chiweenee from going under my car seat while driving. It was a shock to see her wiggle her way under the seat. At the same time that it restrains her it still allows for her to move comfofortably but safely in the back seat. TAKE NOTE - I have a Honda Accord and at first it looked like it wouldn't click in, but you just have to push it in a little further. It unclicks without a problem when you want it removed. Otherwise it stays in place to safely tether the dog.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality Product and Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Quality. This is basically a small seatbelt that smoothly buckles right into the seatbelt buckle. It's long enough when extended to allow my dog to sit up or lay down on the seat. I have no doubt it would perform exactly as a seatbelt should as necessary. I contacted the EzyDog manufacturers due to a small glitch with my order and they got back to me and fixed the issue immediately. Great costumer service! I highly recommend this product and company.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara J. Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this seatbelt restraint. It works great at keeping my Pit Bull Mix puppy that weighs 70 pounds at 9 months old in place while in my van. He used to roam and be worried while the car was moving but now he is kept where he is supposed to be which has calmed him down. He pulls hard when at first we get out of the van because he has to wait until I get my wheelchair ready and it's strong enough to hold him from shooting out of the car. Very well worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, LOVE this!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old dog loves to move around while I'm driving. He has severe anxiety and always manages to come up front with me, not matter how secure I would have his leash wrapped around the passenger seat. And then I discovered the EzyDog Click!!!!! Yesssssss, it keeps him in ONE place while we travel and allows just enough room for him to scoot near the window. Since we have more than one dog, I'll be ordering 2 more of these!!!! I love that my fur babies are secure and safe while riding with us!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping my dog in the backseat
customer_reviews.text: I use this to keep my dog in the backseat of my car and out of my lap while driving. It’s great for that purpose, but not crash rated. EzyDog sells a harness that is crash safety rated. I intend to purchase that next, but for now I am using their EzyDog harness with this seatbelt. I never attach the seatbelt to the collar, always use it with a harness for safety and comfort. I own several collars and seatbelts made by this company and pleased with them. Durable and long lasting, but always watch your dog because they will chew if left unattended.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Walden

customer_reviews.title: Too short even at longest setting
customer_reviews.text: Too short for my 60lb dog...she can't even sit up straight. (Yes, even at the longest length) Had the vet come out and look at it and they agreed this will not work for her since she can't sit up. They need to make a longer version for taller dogs, I guess. Looks good quality, no issues there and would order another if they made a longer one.
customer_reviews.author: MAB

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use in my 1994 Jeep Wrangler. It does not fit the seat belt configuration on that vehicle. I tried it on my 2010 Dodge Ram and it fits that configuration. I was going to return it but will keep it because I may occasionally use it in my Ram. However it does not meet my expectations as I primarily needed it to restrain my dog in my 1994 Jeep.
customer_reviews.author: M. Burns

customer_reviews.title: My dachshund loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my dachshund b/c he's all over my lap and the front seat of the car. I bought this in a medium size b/c he's a standard sized dachshund and although it's great for him, it is a bit big for my bucket seats. However, I do love it - it's like a big couch for him and he doesn't have to stand on his hind legs to see out the window which he loves to do!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Allows dog to safely put head at window
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that this keeps my dog in place while I am driving. No more jumping in my lap or on top of my work pile in the front seat. I can open the window and let her put her head a safe distance out the window with out fear of her jumping out or hanging out too far. Another great feature is that when I open the door to let her out, she can't jump out and take off. This has happened to me before because she is so excited to be on an adventure.
customer_reviews.author: C. S. Isbell

customer_reviews.title: Makes us and our pup feel safer
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolute must buy for dog owners! It’s super easy to use and gives my husband and I a great sense of relief when we go for car rides. We always have our dog wear her harness when we’re in the car and then affix the belt to it. It’s designed like a seatbelt so it snaps right in. She is able to sit and and lay down comfortable; maybe take a few steps in any direction, but she’s not wandering or sliding around in the back seat.
customer_reviews.author: Ilyse

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my dog safe and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 50 lb lab, and this is great for keeping him secure, and stopping him from crawling up to the driver's seat in my sedan. It's long enough for him to stand up and look out the window, sit up straight in the backseat, turn around, and lay down. My dog wears a harness (EzyDog Quick Fit Harness) and this works very well without straining his neck. I could see this being less comfortable if it's just attached to a traditional collar.
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: sit and lay down comfortably. We primarily wanted this to keep him safer ...
customer_reviews.text: This car harness has worked out really well with our 25lb poodle mix. I was concerned that he would be TOO restrained, but that's not the case. He can freely stand, look out all windows, sit and lay down comfortably. We primarily wanted this to keep him safer in the back seat and also to keep him from trying to get through the middle section between the front seats. We have had to stop short on a couple of occasions and I didn't have to panic that he would be thrown. This is such a simple yet brilliant solution. I plan on ordering a separate one for my husband's car.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Baker

customer_reviews.title: No More Losing a Loved One Out A Back Window:)
customer_reviews.text: Was just what we needed to keep our English Setter safe in the back seat where he loves to move back and forth from window to window. This helps us know that we will not lose him out the window going around a corner!!! Product is well made and is adjustable...just right for our 55 pound guy in the back of a Nissan. Would recommend to others. Easy to use and dog does not seem to feel overly restricted while on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... already had the EzyDog harness - which has been wonderful as our 19+ lbs dog had been able to ...
customer_reviews.text: We already had the EzyDog harness - which has been wonderful as our 19+ lbs dog had been able to escape from harnesses in the car - and recently purchased the EzyDog CLICK Seat Belt Harness for a road trip. It worked well - allowing movement, but not access to the window, which was what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: KJFreeman

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it if you have a 1 year old Golden Retriever.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is less than useless for a large dog. Our Golden Retriever consistently steps on the seat belt latch and releases herself. It would probably work great for a cat, a very small dog, or an older dog that didn’t move around much in the back seat.
customer_reviews.author: DaveS

customer_reviews.title: It provides safety for your pet and it is easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: The Easy Dog seat belt harness was very easy to use. It snapped into our existing buckles and we could adjust the length of the Easy Dog belt to accommodate our pooch. We have a shoulder harness for our dog and it hooks right on to the loop on the back of the harness. It gives you peace of mind knowing that in case of an accident our pet will not become a projectile flying through the car.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Miller

customer_reviews.title: The best so far
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. I've tried a few things to keep my two pups entertained yet safe in my back seat, and this seems to work best. They stay put, but still have the flexibility to move about. I've bought 2 so far, for my car, but will likely buy 2 more for my wife's car.
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE

customer_reviews.title: Well built and a good value.
customer_reviews.text: This product met my expectations for durability and value. The only reason I only gave it 4 stars is I had to hook two of them together for my purposes. One unit was not long enough [even when fully extended] to allow my dog to put his head out the passenger side window [while standing]. Other than that it is a great product all the way around ....
customer_reviews.author: karl engelbart

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be easier to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a great seatbelt. You just click one end into your car seatbelt (unless you have a Volvo), and the other on your dog's harness, and you go. You can adjust the length to give them more or less room to roam around the back seat. Our dog is very comfortable and content when we drive. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: cryogini

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is super simple to use and works great for my 35 pd dog. I have it pretty long so he can move around comfortably but still secure. Very happy with my purchase. It seems sturdy so we’ll see over time.
customer_reviews.author: TroutGirl

customer_reviews.title: The dog can step on the buckle and release the clip
customer_reviews.text: This product seemed to be a perfect addition as we own ezydog harnesses and they are great. However with the first use of this clip with our 1-year-old 30 lb Brittany he stepped on the seat belt buckle and released the clip twice in one brief trip.. Yikes...this was in a BMW X5. We hoped this would work in our Ford truck as well but have not tried it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up from our Wiener Dog!
customer_reviews.text: I love this genius invention. Wherever we take our weenie dog, Izzy this seatbelt keeps her safe and secure. Easy to switch from one car to another. Can be expanded for bigger dogs.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bailor

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and durable but too short
customer_reviews.text: I like the design and durability but the length is too short for either of my cars. I’m disappointed I bought 2 of them. I will be going back to what I used previously that loops around the actual seat belt and is more flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Musto

customer_reviews.title: Seatbelt Harness
customer_reviews.text: It works great! I also feel my dog is secure should I have to brake fast and he not become a projectile in the vehicle. Yet he has mobility to lay down or stand and watch out the windows.
customer_reviews.author: L. Wentworth

customer_reviews.title: Seems to keep our "Little Boy" really safe.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and keeps our pup safe so he can enjoy his rides without being in a crate the whole time. Would Highly recommend this for your pet no matter what size it is. Buy one, you won't be sorry. NOT COMPATIBLE WITH VOLVO!
customer_reviews.author: Larrie J. Ausman

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Your Pet in Place Without a Stay Command
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Keeps Baxter on the seat and not roaming around the car. Just wish I felt that he was protected if an accident, but that would mean harness, etc. which this is not.
customer_reviews.author: P. J. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: I just received this item and I have to say that I am impressed. I can't look into the future and I hope that I never have to see it in action. However, I can speak to how well made it is. The material is strong and the stiching is perfect. I feel that I have received a quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Maggiepirsq

customer_reviews.title: Precious cargo protector
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this product, we travel a lot and use this to keep our 85lb Shepard secure. She still has the ability to move and stretch out to sleep. Please use this with the harness of your choice and not their collar!
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: I hate to read about pets lost in an auto accident
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly, I wish more people used these. I hate to read about pets lost in an auto accident. I bought a padded harness from Amazon which I clip this to so my dog can be comfy.
customer_reviews.author: JERi

customer_reviews.title: I have told all my dog owner friends about this buckle
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough about this product. My 35lb French Bulldog who does not fit in any car seats loves his buckle and feels secure when I fasten him in. He know his limits with it and doesn’t push past them. Easy to click on your seatbelt buckle and on you go.
customer_reviews.author: TRISHA ORABUENA

customer_reviews.title: Not for young dogs that are chewers..
customer_reviews.text: Got this 6/25/19. Used this the first time for a 7 minute ride and my dog chewed through it like it was it was a jerky doggie treat.
customer_reviews.author: Kkt

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Ive been through a few of these seat belts, this one is non intrusive and can easily be attached and moved between vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: John Fisher @ Fisharply

customer_reviews.title: This is a quality product and as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: My problem is that it is too short. My Havanese sits in a car seat and the seat belt is too short to reach. We haven't figured out what to do yet. We really needed an extra 18" but figured it was our problem as it is shown with the dog sitting in the cars seat. We want our dog to be able to look out, so it sits higher.
customer_reviews.author: Truman Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using the Ezy Dog harness and seat belt system for years. This is so much easier to use than the other (with the loop that the seat belt feeds through) because it simply clips to the harness and then buckles in. It's quick and easy. It's also adjustable so you can give the dog more or less lead as needed.
customer_reviews.author: GoofeeHood

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This CLICK works perfectly for our outdoor excursions with the golf cart. Our dog is secured by the seatbelt attachment to his harness, leaving our hands free to drive! The CLICK is sturdy and has adjustable lengths. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: vpsalm91

customer_reviews.title: Love EzyDog products
customer_reviews.text: I liked this EzyDog eat belt harness so much that I bought another for my second vehicle 2 weeks later. They are first rate quality, very substantial. Perfect for restraining my dog while still giving him leeway to move about a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Keeping my dog safe!
customer_reviews.text: This seat belt adds extra security for all the times I travel with my dog. Giving me greater ease and my dog is able to lay down and be totally comfortable while riding in the car..
customer_reviews.author: Loren M. Gelberg-Goff, LCSW

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: We just got this belt buckle and have only used it for short trips around town/to the dog park down the road. It does its job so far. I do wish it could get a little bit shorter, otherwise it's great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: This seatbelt did not fit any of my cars seatbelts. It was too small.
customer_reviews.author: Kari M.

customer_reviews.title: Car crash tested
customer_reviews.text: We were tboned today & this saved my cockapoo’s life. ❤️❤️❤️❤️ It’s very simple to use. It hooks up to my dogs harness easily & I’m still able to keep her leash on.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Giamanco

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Instructions could have been better, but good product to keep pup in the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Reads and Crafts

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Just click it in to seatbelt recepticle and the other end to your dogs harness. Long enough that he can still look out the window
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Lusby

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my pup from jumping in my lap while driving and she’s safely buckled in.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B. Diddles

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well, we have a larger male Golden Retriever and he enjoys moving around a little. He was able to move between windows while locked into the middle seat belt attachment. We may need to adjust it a bit but it seems to work. We typically would only use it on longer drives. Seems well made and I like the adjustability of this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Todd D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Sure was glad to see this rig as an option for our Havanese! Very well made, and so easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Rod McCallum

customer_reviews.title: Less distractions when driving and safer for pup!
customer_reviews.text: Placed my pup in a harness to attach to it in the backseat. Allows for movement but prevents him from climbing into the front seat and being in danger of an airbag inflating.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Lacefield

customer_reviews.title: Good Restraint
customer_reviews.text: This restraint works just fine in my '18 Toyota Highlander. It snaps into the 2nd row seatbelt connector without a problem. Highly recommended for holding dog from moving about in the car.
customer_reviews.author: BernieS

customer_reviews.title: EZYCLICK Dog Harness
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my golden retriever and lab. I had used their leash when going to the vet to keep them secure, but the Ezydog click harness is fantastic, great invention ever. Fits perfectly in Ford Explorer. Janice H
customer_reviews.author: Michael Haymon

customer_reviews.title: Safety
customer_reviews.text: Adjustable length is good for different size dogs . Clip is a little heavy for my small dog but it is ok. 12 lbs. Keeps pet safe in the back seat. Happy with pet bed and room to move.
customer_reviews.author: Edna Biel

customer_reviews.title: Maybe not good for chewing puppies
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one and our Aussie has chewed through both at record pace. If your dog is older, you’re probably fine. But if your puppy or dog is prone to chewing... it will not stand up. Our puppy even chewed half way through one of our car seatbelts, again at record pace - talking 30 secs. If your dog is not a chewer, recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Aussie mom

customer_reviews.title: Cross Country trip
customer_reviews.text: We used these on a cross country road trip and were happy to have them. Gives the dogs sufficient mobility although our two Bassets basically slept for 3,000 miles :)
customer_reviews.author: J. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: safety strap in the car
customer_reviews.text: its terrific to keep my needy lap dog contained while I drive!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Thon

customer_reviews.title: Not for 60 lb. Pitbull who likes to move around..
customer_reviews.text: Prefer harness attached to the headrest...my guy keeps getting it stuck between his legs....
customer_reviews.author: arthur

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had it a couple of days, but seems very well made and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: LISA

customer_reviews.title: Well-made Product
customer_reviews.text: This restraint was the perfect solution to my dog's anxious behavior in the car. After a few uses, she is sitting more still knowing she can't go anywhere. It's safer for her, and for the rest of us in the car. The seat belt seems well made, and it's adjustable for length.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Freedom!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other restraints and they are usually difficult to install and too short for dog to be able to move. This works so well and is so easy. Clicks right in the seatbelt latch and is long enough to give dog enough freedom to move without being hurt or too closely restrained. I recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: wentwhereTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Feel like he is safer now with the hartness. He has room to move, but not too much. Keeps him in his seat, but he can still look out the window. Would recommend. Came quickly and was just as stated.
customer_reviews.author: MNKate

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is good.. It fits the seatbelt of my 04 Honda CR-V with no problem, however I also bought a mighty paws unit that clips to the child safety seat anchor and I like that one much better.. No chance of my dog accidentally stepping in the seat belt release and unbuckling herself while I'm driving
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit in the seatbelt piece on either car.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and works great. Keeps my little dog from climbing into my lap while driving.
customer_reviews.author: Shari_C

customer_reviews.title: Works great Clicks to the seat belt
customer_reviews.text: Works great Clicks to the seat belt. Dog unhooked the seat belt. Had to get a a seat belt button protector so the dog can not unhook from the seat belt
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised with this product. Much stronger than we expected!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of EzyDog products and have been buying them for 10+ years. This is the first really disappointing product. My dog chewed through this one in less than 5-6 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Dog chewed through in 5 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea. Appeared to work great. Five minutes after securing 32 lb dog, he jumped up. Had quietly chewed through it in two spots. Flimsy material with great hook. Needs a revamp
customer_reviews.author: txpeach

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this.
customer_reviews.text: Love how this clicks into the seatbelt. Our dog can still stick her head out the window when she wants. Adjustable straps.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Keeps dog from sliding around
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use. My dog is a large dog and it reaches she harness with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Keeps dog safe and secure.
customer_reviews.text: My medium size dog Sachi wanted to be on my lap when we traveled. The EzyDog Click seat belt keeps her in the back and she can still see me and look out the window. It gives me peace of mind knowing that she is secure and that I can drive without distractions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stronger than most
customer_reviews.text: This steel clip is stronger and thicker than most stamped aluminum versions on the market. In a sudden stop or worse, I have more faith in a quality clip keeping my dog safe.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie M.

customer_reviews.title: SUPER!
customer_reviews.text: Ezydog dear restraint is just what I was looking for; protection for my dog with some flexibilty. SUPER!
customer_reviews.author: Winnie

customer_reviews.title: Very good product at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. The building led light is a nice bonus for night walks. Very good product at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Camus

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the restraint for my daughter’s one year old dog. I was worried about my daughter and her dog’s safety while traveling. She called and said it was so cool and easy to use. She said her sweet pup didn’t mind the restraint at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this seatbelt
customer_reviews.text: Love this seatbelt, highly recommended for a good fit but with enough wiggle room so they can move... JIUST a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: remotereader

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Got one for each of my dogs
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Got one for each of my dogs. I love that the length is adjustable so I was able to make them long enough for the dogs to sit or lay down on the back seat. Keeps them safe and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki L Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Fit the bill
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Best thing ever! So glad found this option for car rides!
customer_reviews.author: CadyRose Headings

customer_reviews.title: Safety in the car!
customer_reviews.text: I love this restraint! It took Millie a minute to adjust but, now she doesn’t mind at all. It gives us peace of mind knowing she is secure and we are not distracted!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keep them safe
customer_reviews.text: I like it and my Ellie Mae seems happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great product! You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic!!!! VERY well-made and durable. It has allowed us to take our dog on many outings and to ride safely in the car! Thank you for a very well-made product! Excellent Customer Service!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Dianno

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product did exactly what I expected from the description and pictures. I helps limit where my dog moves in the car so I don't have to worry where she is.
customer_reviews.author: paintcat

customer_reviews.title: Great Pet seatbelt
customer_reviews.text: The seat belt is great, well made and works very well
customer_reviews.author: C. Sellers

customer_reviews.title: Longer than other leashes
customer_reviews.text: The leash allows my dog to be more comfortable an peer between the seats out the front window which lessens the chance of car sickness; yet, it keeps my dog secure.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dog restraint
customer_reviews.text: Easy and great to keep dog in seat. Everyone should have one
customer_reviews.author: Jackie LaChapelle

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Super easy to use. The swivel let’s my little guy do his circle dance to find his comfort spot.
customer_reviews.author: Durland Girl

customer_reviews.title: My Dogs life
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to protect my dog from Injury if I were ever in an accident. The first time I used it, my dog jumped off the seat and I could just see him hanging himself?
customer_reviews.author: Tammie K Hibshman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who had just gotten a new puppy. The puppy goes everywhere with her and her family and rides safely in the middle seat in back. It has worked out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Wish I would have purchased one a ...
customer_reviews.text: Our Irish Setter has a lot of energy to say the least. This not only keeps him safe but it kept him in his place. Great product. Wish I would have purchased one a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Heath

customer_reviews.title: High quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! I feel so safe with my dog buckled in while I am driving. I honestly feel if I got into an accident this seat belt would prevent my dog from flying through the windshield. I clip it on her harness rather than her collar, as shown in the picture, so she wouldn't be choked if I had to stop suddenly. This buckles into my car with ease, I have a 2014 Ford Fiesta. The seatbelt quality is as good if not better than the seatbelts in my car, very heavy duty! This pairs super well with the BarksBar pet seat cover because it has holes to allow for seat belts! Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Ann M

customer_reviews.title: Works for us!
customer_reviews.text: My service dog goes EVERYWHERE with me! It's so important that he's safe with all the time he spends in the car with me. This product is so perfect. I have a VW and it's works great with the buckle. My dog is medium sized- 50lbs. I have a Jetta, and he can still move around plenty but is restrained if I have to make a sudden stop. I also don't have to worry about him accidentally jumping out of the car before I'm ready since he wants to be by my side. I clip it to the back of his harness.
customer_reviews.author: LeeLee

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Durable and easy to use. Our dog had chewed through leashes and can't make a dent in this. Easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne T

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't what I expected but for my medium-sized dog, it will suffice.
customer_reviews.author: TheAverageConsumer1738

customer_reviews.title: Item is well made and adjusts easily. I am relieved knowing that my dog is ...
customer_reviews.text: Item is well made and adjusts easily. I am relieved knowing that my dog is safely restrained when traveling.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Works great by keeping my pup in the back seat.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well-made product, and is simple to use. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Lila Philips

customer_reviews.title: Secure and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! This seat belt secures my 65 pound dog comfortably and provides her a little wiggle room. I’m very happy with the quality too.
customer_reviews.author: Cja

customer_reviews.title: Recommend to big dog owners
customer_reviews.text: My german Shepherd loves this. Not only does it keep him safe in the car but it’s also his new walking harness!
customer_reviews.author: California Girl

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit center seat
customer_reviews.text: Wanted this product for center seat in our Toyota Highlander — it works fine in other seats but not the center.
customer_reviews.author: Asbkworm

customer_reviews.title: Mattie enjoys going for a ride using your product-thanks!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install-no adjustment as to length necessary. Easy to move from one car to the next.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact I can keep my young pup secure and that I can quickly get him in and out of the car. Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Adjusts to give the dog a little room to move around but stay contained to the seat

customer_reviews.title: Great restraint.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that it was adjustable. It was just what I was looking for.

product_meta.title: EzyDog Click - Best Dog Seat Belt Car Harness Attachment Dogs - Adjustable Dog Restraints Seatbelts Cars
product_meta.description: Color:BlackThe Click Adjustable Car Restraint from EzyDog, is a simple to use dog car harness that keeps your pup in one position while preventing driver distraction. Just click it into a car's seat belt buckle receiver and clip the snap hook to your pup's harness and you're good to go. Fully adjustable from 17.5 to 26 Inch; suitable for different size dogs and allows flexibility for movement in the car. Pair the EzyDog Click Adjustable Car Restraint with an EzyDog harness or harness vest. (Not to be used with the EzyDog DRIVE Crash Tested Harness) Caution: This product is designed to be used with an EzyDog harness to prevent driver distraction and restrain the dog to one position in the vehicle. In the event of a car accident it may not prevent injury to the passengers or your dog. Inspect attachment for wear or abrasion. Do not use if damaged. NOT for use in Volvo brand automobiles.
feature_bullets: SIMPLE "CLICK IT AND GO” DESIGN: Cold rolled steel buckle attachment easy-to-use "Click it and Go" design makes travel safety for you and your dog a snap!

2400 LB. BREAKING STRENGTH ABRASION-RESISTANT NYLON SEAT BELT WEBBING: Fully adjustable from 17.5” to 26” Reinforced precision computer stitching for strength, performance, and unsurpassed durability.

REDUCES DRIVER DISTRACTION FOR SAFER CAR TRIPS: Enhanced industry standard swivel-style snap hook is electroplated for durability and abrasion resistance. Simple design improves pet comfort and makes it easy to use it every time you travel.

THE CLICK ADJUSTABLE CAR RESTRAINT SYSTEM IS COMPATIBLE WITH AWARD-WINNING EZYDOG HARNESSES: For award-winning comfort and control use your CLICK restraint with our EzyDog Quick Fit, Chest Plate, or Convert dog harnesses.
CAUTION: TO AVOID CHOKING OR INJURY ALWAYS USE A CAR RESTRAINT WITH A HARNESS NEVER A COLLAR. *CLICK DOES NOT FIT AND IS NOT FOR USE IN VOLVO AUTOMOBILES.
